title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street ends higher on back of buoyant Apple, Microsoft
text:
US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street ends higher on back of buoyant Apple, Microsoft

Stock Markets 4 hours ago (Oct 01, 2019 01:40)

© Reuters. US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street ends higher on back of buoyant Apple, Microsoft Sept 30 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks rose on Monday, helped by gains in Apple (NASDAQ: ), Microsoft (NASDAQ: ) and Merck (NS: ) & Co as investors set aside worries about the U.S.-China trade war. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 95.9 points, or 0.36%, to 26,916.15, the S&P 500 gained 14.89 points, or 0.50%, to 2,976.68 and the Nasdaq Composite added 59.71 points, or 0.75%, to 7,999.34.

US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street ends higher on back of buoyant Apple, Microsoft
description: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall Street ends higher on back of buoyant Apple, Microsoft
